auth.joinUs: Join Get Content AI and start creating amazing content

hero.title: Create Engaging Social Media Content with AI

aiPowered.title: AI-Powered Generation

multiPlatform.title: Multi-Platform Optimization
multiPlatform.description: Content optimized for Instagram, Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn with platform-specific best practices.

imageGeneration.title: Image Generation
imageGeneration.description: Create stunning visuals with DALL-E 3 or upload your own images, automatically sized for each platform.
